'''''Blessed Hamada''''' contains [[Achievements]] related to the [[Girdle of the Sands]] subregion in [[Sumeru]] and rewards the [[Achievement: Infinitum]] [[Namecard]].

==Achievement List==
{{Achievements by Category Table}}

==Trivia ==
*{{w|Hamada}} {{Lang|ar_rm=ḥammāda|ar=حمادة}} is a specific type of high, barren desert plateau, where most of the sand has been removed due the erosion of wind.
